info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 13 at 10:33AM EST until February 13 at 8:00PM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches through this evening bringing storm total snow accumulations since this morning to 3 to 7 inches with localized higher amounts. A band of heavy lake effect snow will continue to drop across central and southern Berrien County this morning and into the far western portions of Cass County. Additional moderate to heavy lake effect snow is possible this afternoon. * WHERE...Cass MI and Berrien Counties. The greatest accumulations are expected across central and northern Berrien County. * WHEN...Until 8 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wind chills will drop to around 0 again tonight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
